newsitem.title: USA: NRT Inc in preliminary pacts on acquisitions.
newsitem.headline: NRT Inc in preliminary pacts on acquisitions.

text.p: NRT Inc, a newly formed joint venture by HFS Inc and the Apollo Management L.P. group, has reached preliminary agreements to acquire several large real estate brokerage companies, HFS and the Apollo groups said Tuesday.
NRT, which the groups initially funded with $232 million, aims to acquire residential real estate brokerage firms.

HFS and the Apollo groups said that as its first acquistion, NRT has agreed to buy National Realty Trust, the largest U.S. real estate brokerage firm and HFS's largest real estate franchisee, for an undisclosed sum.
They said that the preliminary agreements with the prospective acquisitions are subject to definitive documentation and other customary conditions.
